item.description:
BriefDating for Western Massachusetts
Find your sweet heart for the Fall Foliage!

Date: September 30th, 6pm to 9pm
Cost: $35 (payment details at http://www.BriefDating.com)

Note: Usually 50 to 70 people attend BriefDating events including many people outside of Meetup.

Age Range: Approx. 25 to 55.

Please note: pre-registration and pre-payment at http://www.BriefDating.com is required. No walk-ins allowed. Please see BriefDating.com for details.

BriefDating--A Great Way to Meet People!

* Meet many singles, quickly and easily
At these speed dating events you will have between 7 and 17 dates in one fun evening.

* Get a sense if you "click" in a few minutes
Each brief date is just 6 minutes.

* Safe and no pressure
You don't ask each other out. You just mark on your Dating Card if you like the person. Contact information is only sent when there is a match.

* BriefDating Works! These events have a 60% to 85% match rate!

Testimonial:

"I have met a lovely lady at your September 24th event. I know and understand that it's in the very early stages of the relationship, but we have spent so much time together since then and we can't get enough of each other.

I speak pretty confidently when I say that it was love at first sight (for both of us). So keep up the good deed..." Glenn (Glenn and Jen are now married.)

For all of the details and to sign up: http://www.briefdating.com
item.name: Speed Dating in Western Mass - Sept 30, 2012
